summary: Himachali Editor – a videography shoot & editing service website with one-time and monthly package pricing, online booking, and customer login.
architectural_notes: Project name: Himachali Editor – videography shoot & editing service website
Pricing in INR (₹); two tiers: one-time services and monthly packages
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cinematic dark hero background with blurred mountain landscape and bokeh light streaks, suitable for a videography brand (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Abstract dark textured background with subtle film grain and warm gold tones for pricing section (pricing-bg.dim_1920x600.png)
- Himachali Editor brand logo — golden camera icon with stylized mountain silhouette, minimal and modern on transparent background (logo.dim_300x100.png)

existing_features.title: Design a visually striking cinematic theme for the Himachali Editor website using a dark, moody color palette (deep blacks, warm golds, and mountain-inspired earthy tones), bold typography, and full-width hero sections. Apply this theme consistently across all pages and components.

Create a landing/home page for 'Himachali Editor' that includes a hero section with the brand name and tagline about videography shoot & editing services, a brief about section, and clear navigation to Pricing and Booking sections.

Display a One-Time Services pricing section with the following four services and their prices: Normal Video Editing + Shoot (₹4,000), High Video Editing + Shoot (₹5,000), Car Delivery Shoot (₹2,500), Bike Delivery Shoot (₹2,000). Each card should show the service name, price, and a 'Book Now' button.

Display a Monthly Packages pricing section with three packages: Basic (8–12 videos, Normal Edit + Shoot, ₹12,000), Premium (10–15 videos, High Edit + Shoot, ₹15,000), Pro (10–15 videos, High Edit + Shoot + Social Media Management, ₹18,000). Each package card should show the package name, included deliverables, price, and a 'Subscribe' button. Visually highlight the Pro package as the most popular or recommended.

Implement a customer authentication system using Internet Identity. Customers must be able to log in and log out. A unique customer profile/ID should be associated with their Internet Identity principal and stored in the backend.

Implement an online booking form UI. When a logged-in customer clicks 'Book Now' or 'Subscribe' on any service or package, a booking modal or page should open pre-filled with the selected service/package name. The form should collect preferred date, optional notes, and submit to the backend booking API. Unauthenticated users should be prompted to log in before booking.
Create a customer dashboard page accessible only when logged in. It should display the customer's booking history with service name, booking date, and status for each booking.

new_feature_requests.summary: Display one-time service charges: Normal edit+shoot ₹4000, High edit+shoot ₹5000, Car delivery shoot ₹2500, Bike delivery shoot ₹2000
Display monthly packages: Basic (8-12 videos, normal edit+shoot) ₹12000, Premium (10-15 videos, high edit+shoot) ₹15000, Pro (10-15 videos, high edit+shoot + social media mgmt) ₹18000
Online booking system with customer ID login for booking services/packages
Implement a backend data model and API for storing customer profiles. Each profile should include: principal ID, display name, email (optional), and registration timestamp.

Implement a backend data model and API for bookings. Each booking record should include: booking ID, customer principal, service or package name, selected date, status (pending/confirmed/completed), and booking timestamp. Provide functions to create a new booking and retrieve bookings for the logged-in customer.
